app-description: Compare the cost of different providers of cloud services with EasyCloud, your application that helps you to save money and time.

save-your-quotes.title: SAVE YOUR QUOTES
save-your-quotes.description: You can save all your quotes and view them at any time and place.

simultaneously-quote.title: SIMULTANEOUSLY QUOTE
simultaneously-quote.description: Quote your cloud providers services simultaneously.

main-cloud-services.title: MAIN CLOUD SERVICES
main-cloud-services.description: You can choose from virtual machines, databases or serverless computing.

free-card.title: Personal
free-card.item2: Save five quotes in your account
